sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./dashboard.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Dashboard() { const [publishers, setPublisher] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getPublisher = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/publishers/"); setPublisher(res.data) } getPublisher() }, []) const [upload, setUpload] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchPosts = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/upload") setUpload(res.data) } fetchPosts() }, []) return (

Dashboard New alerts

{publishers.map((p)=>(

Welcome back {p.firstName}! Your current account balance is $50. This page contain the list of books you've uploaded so far with purchased count

))}
{upload.bookCover &&( )}

sold: 23 Date: {new Date(upload.createdAt).toDateString()}

{/*

Purchased: 3

Purchased: 20

Purchased: 10

Purchased: 2

Purchased: 0

Purchased: 11

Purchased: 1

Purchased: 20

Purchased: 22

Purchased: 0

*/}

); }
